a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Time spent on unpaid work, per day, men vs women
Average minutes spent on unpaid work or study, per day, by sex (ages 15-65). Unpaid work activities include: routine
housework; care for household members; child care; adult care; care for non-household members; volunteering;
travel related to household activities; other unpaid work. Estimates come from time-use surveys and include both
weekdays and weekends. The survey years differ across countries. See the source description for the survey year
Minutes spent on unpaid work - men (15-65)
Minutes spent on unpaid work - women (15-65)
